select b.bkno, b.bkname, b.bkwrite, b.bkpublisher, b.bkcate, r.rsdate, r.rddate, r.rdel, r.rno, r.mid from books b join rental r
b.bkno = r.bkno and b.bkcate = #{cate}

select DATE_FORMAT(t.tdate, '%y-%m-%d') AS ttdate, b.bkcate, SUM(t.ttotal) AS total from trade t, books b where t.bkno = b.bkno and b.bkcate = #{cate} group by ttdate, b.bkcate
select DATE_FORMAT(r.rsdate, '%y-%m-%d') AS rsdate, b.bkcate, count(r.rno) AS count from rental r, books b where r.bkno = b.bkno and b.bkcate = #{cate} group by r.rsdate, b.bkcate
